imdb.plot outline: The Odyssey is about one question: Who will you be when you can be anyone? An explorer, blazing a trail for others to follow? An inventor, making a difference with the right creativity at the right time? A leader, inspiring your friends to do the impossible? Waking up in the Wildwood is a chance to become the person you've always wanted to be - as you make friends, develop relationships, and work with others to uncover the mystery of the Wildwood - and find a way home.
imdb.title: The Odyssey Spin-Off
